0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu: Settle into a cheap hotel. Visit Pashupatinath and experience local cuisine like momos.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 2: Explore Swoyambhunath: Visit Swoyambhunath (Monkey Temple). Enjoy dalbhat for lunch. Evening walk around Thamel.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 3: Ride to Dhampus: Motorcycle journey to Dhampus. Stay in a budget guesthouse. Enjoy the mountain views.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 4: Hike in Dhampus: Morning hike. Explore local villages. Savor traditional Nepali food like chicken curry.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 5: Travel to Pokhara: Motorcycle to Pokhara. Check into a cheap hotel. Evening lakeside walk and local dinner.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 6: Boating in Phewa Lake: Morning boat ride on Phewa Lake. Visit Barahi Temple. Explore Pokhara's lakeside cafes.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 7: Paragliding Adventure: Morning paragliding. Afternoon visit to Davis Fall and Gupteshwor Cave.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 8: Rest Day in Pokhara: Relax by the lake, visit local shops, and enjoy a leisurely day with dalbhat.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 9: Ride to Chitwan: Motorcycle journey to Chitwan. Check into a budget hotel. Evening jungle walk.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 10: Chitwan Safari: Full-day jungle safari. Spot wildlife and enjoy traditional Tharu dance in the evening.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 11: Ride to Mustang: Begin your motorcycle journey to Mustang. Stay at a budget-friendly guesthouse.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 12: Explore Mustang: Explore Mustang's unique landscapes. Visit local monasteries and enjoy traditional Nepali meals.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 13: Mustang Adventure: Continue exploring Mustang. Take in the stunning views and cultural sites.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 14: Ride to Bhedetar: Motorcycle journey to Bhedetar. Check into a budget accommodation. Evening relaxation.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 15: Explore Bhedetar: Discover Bhedetar's scenic beauty. Visit local attractions and enjoy local roti.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 16: Return to Kathmandu: Ride back to Kathmandu. Check into a cheap hotel. Evening stroll in Thamel.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 17: Kathmandu Relaxation: Rest day. Visit local markets and enjoy Nepali cuisine like chicken curry.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 18: Kathmandu Exploration: Visit cultural sites like Boudhanath and Bhaktapur. Enjoy momos for lunch.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 19: Souvenir Shopping: Last-minute shopping in Kathmandu. Relax and prepare for departure.

0770e8fe-ced8-4f7b-86c4-56982efd4c7b.Day 20: Departure: Check out of the hotel and head to the airport for your journey home.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu: Arrive in Kathmandu and check into a budget-friendly hotel like Kathmandu Grand Hotel. Explore Thamel for shopping and dining. Enjoy a dinner of momos and chicken curry at OR2K restaurant.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 2: Kathmandu Sightseeing: Visit Pashupatinath and Swoyambhunath (Monkey Temple). Have lunch at a local eatery with dalbhat. In the evening, explore the vibrant streets of Thamel.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 3: Ride to Dhampus: Rent a motorcycle and ride to Dhampus. Check into a low-cost guesthouse like Dhampus Village Guesthouse. Enjoy stunning mountain views and a traditional Nepali dinner of dalbhat and roti.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 4: Hiking in Dhampus: Spend the day hiking and exploring the Dhampus area. Have a packed lunch and return to the guesthouse for a relaxing evening with a warm meal.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 5: Ride to Pokhara: Ride to Pokhara. Check into a budget hotel such as Hotel Point. In the evening, stroll around Phewa Lake and dine on momos at a lakeside restaurant.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 6: Pokhara Sightseeing: Start with a visit to Davis Falls and Gupteshwor Cave. Have lunch at a local eatery. In the afternoon, visit the International Mountain Museum. Enjoy dinner at a lakeside restaurant.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 7: Paragliding in Pokhara: Experience paragliding with a local agency like Sunrise Paragliding. Afterward, enjoy a relaxed afternoon by the lake and dinner at a local restaurant.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 8: Boating on Phewa Lake: Spend the morning boating on Phewa Lake. Have lunch at a lakeside café. In the afternoon, visit the World Peace Pagoda. Return to the hotel for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 9: Ride to Mustang: Start early for the ride to Mustang. Check into a budget-friendly guesthouse like Hotel Mustang Gateway. Enjoy a traditional meal of dalbhat and chicken curry.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 10: Explore Mustang: Spend the day exploring Mustang. Visit local monasteries and enjoy the unique landscape. Have lunch at a local eatery. Return to the guesthouse for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 11: Ride to Bhedetar: Ride to Bhedetar and check into a low-cost guesthouse like Bhedetar Eco Resort. Relax and enjoy the moderate weather and beautiful views. Have dinner at the guesthouse.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 12: Bhedetar Exploration: Explore Bhedetar and its surroundings. Enjoy local hikes and visit viewpoints. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to the guesthouse for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 13: Ride to Chitwan: Ride to Chitwan and check into a budget hotel such as Hotel Parkland. In the evening, enjoy a traditional Tharu cultural dance show and dinner at the hotel.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 14: Chitwan Safari: Spend the day on a jungle safari in Chitwan National Park. Spot wildlife and enjoy a packed lunch. Return to the hotel for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 15: Chitwan Boating: Spend the morning boating on the Rapti River. Enjoy a picnic lunch. In the afternoon, visit the Elephant Breeding Center. Return to the hotel for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 16: Ride Back to Pokhara: Ride back to Pokhara. Check into the same budget hotel. Relax and enjoy dinner at a lakeside restaurant.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 17: Relax in Pokhara: Spend a relaxed day in Pokhara. Visit the local market and enjoy a leisurely lunch. In the evening, take a boat ride on Phewa Lake before dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 18: Ride Back to Kathmandu: Ride back to Kathmandu. Check into the same budget-friendly hotel. Spend the evening exploring Thamel and enjoy a farewell dinner of Nepali cuisine.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 19: Free Day in Kathmandu: Enjoy a free day for last-minute shopping or sightseeing in Kathmandu. Have lunch at a local restaurant and revisit your favorite spots. Return to the hotel for dinner.

ac034fe5-cf00-4133-b97c-20b8fa3ae046.Day 20: Departure: Check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport for your departure. Reflect on your amazing trip through the mountains of Nepal.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu: Arrive in Kathmandu, check into a budget-friendly hotel like Kathmandu Guest House in Thamel. Rest and get acclimated. In the evening, explore Thamel's bustling markets and try local momos at Yangling Tibetan Restaurant.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 2: Explore Kathmandu: Visit cultural landmarks such as Pashupatinath Temple and Swoyambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple). Enjoy a traditional Nepali dinner with dalbhat and chicken curry at Bhojan Griha.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 3: Kathmandu to Pokhara: Rent a motorcycle and ride to Pokhara (approximately 6-7 hours). Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Middle Path & Spa. Stroll along Phewa Lake and dine at Moondance Restaurant, famous for its momos and local cuisine.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 4: Pokhara Sightseeing: Start your day with boating on Phewa Lake, then visit Davis Falls and the World Peace Pagoda. For lunch, enjoy chicken curry at OR2K. Spend the night at your hotel.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 5: Paragliding in Pokhara: Experience paragliding in Sarangkot, offering breathtaking views of the Annapurna range. Have lunch at a local eatery. In the evening, relax by the lake and try roti and dalbhat at Lakeside restaurants.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 6: Pokhara to Dhampus: Ride your motorcycle to Dhampus, a scenic village offering stunning mountain views (1.5-hour ride). Check into a local guesthouse like Panorama Guest House. Enjoy local dishes such as momos and dalbhat.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 7: Explore Dhampus: Spend the day hiking around Dhampus, soaking in the majestic views of the Annapurna range. Enjoy local meals at your guesthouse.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 8: Dhampus to Mustang: Embark on an adventurous bike trip to Mustang. This journey will take you through rugged terrains and beautiful landscapes. Stay at a budget-friendly lodge like Hotel Royal Mustang. Enjoy local cuisine.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 9: Explore Mustang: Explore the mystical landscapes of Mustang, visit ancient monasteries. Have lunch at local eateries. Spend the night at your lodge.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 10: Mustang to Bhedetar: Ride to Bhedetar, a hill station in the eastern region (this will be a long ride, plan for breaks). Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Namaste Jharana. Enjoy local dishes.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 11: Relax in Bhedetar: Relax and enjoy the serene environment of Bhedetar. Take short walks and explore the local area. Have meals at your hotel or local restaurants.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 12: Bhedetar to Chitwan: Ride to Chitwan (approximately 5-6 hours). Check into a budget-friendly hotel like Rhino Lodge & Hotel. In the evening, enjoy a traditional Tharu cultural show.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 13: Chitwan Jungle Safari: Take a jungle safari in Chitwan National Park. Spot wildlife such as rhinos, tigers, and various bird species. Have lunch at your hotel. In the evening, enjoy a hearty dinner with dalbhat and chicken curry.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 14: Explore Chitwan: Visit the elephant breeding center, go canoeing, and take a nature walk. Have meals at local restaurants or your hotel.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 15: Chitwan to Pokhara: Ride back to Pokhara. Check into your previous hotel. Rest and enjoy an evening by Phewa Lake.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 16: Relax in Pokhara: Spend the day relaxing, visiting local markets, and enjoying lakeside cafes. Try different local dishes at various restaurants.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 17: Pokhara to Kathmandu: Ride back to Kathmandu. Check into your previous hotel. Rest and explore more of Thamel in the evening.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 18: Kathmandu Valley Tour: Take a day trip to Bhaktapur and Patan, exploring their ancient temples and squares. Have lunch at local restaurants. Return to Kathmandu for dinner.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 19: Final Shopping in Kathmandu: Spend the day shopping for souvenirs in Thamel and Asan Bazaar. Enjoy a farewell dinner at a fine dining restaurant like Krishnarpan.

1ac1c6b4-740d-4dc7-962c-a7b304af2c55.Day 20: Departure: Prepare for departure. Depending on your flight time, you may have a final stroll around Thamel. Check out from the hotel and head to the airport.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu: Arrive in Kathmandu, Nepal. Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Yala Peak in Thamel. Relax and adjust to the new environment. Enjoy a traditional Nepali dinner featuring momos and dalbhat at Thamel House Restaurant.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 2: Explore Kathmandu: Visit Pashupatinath Temple and Swoyambhunath (Monkey Temple). Lunch at a local restaurant, try chicken curry and roti. Explore Thamel's markets in the evening. Return to Hotel Yala Peak for the night.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 3: Ride to Pokhara: Rent a motorcycle and ride to Pokhara. Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Silver Oaks Inn. Enjoy a lakeside dinner with momos and dalbhat at Moondance Restaurant.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 4: Explore Pokhara: Visit Phewa Lake for boating in the morning. Lunch at OR2K Pokhara. Afternoon visit to Davis Falls and the World Peace Pagoda. Dinner at Busy Bee Cafe, try chicken curry.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 5: Paragliding in Pokhara: Morning paragliding session with Frontiers Paragliding. Relax at the lakeside cafes. Dinner at Byanjan Restaurant, try dalbhat and roti.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 6: Ride to Dhampus: Motorcycle ride to Dhampus. Check into Dhampus Village Eco Lodge. Explore the village and enjoy the mountain views. Dinner at the lodge with traditional Nepali food.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 7: Trekking in Dhampus: Full day of trekking in Dhampus with a local guide. Enjoy packed lunch during the trek. Return to the lodge for dinner and relaxation.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 8: Ride to Mustang: Early morning motorcycle ride to Mustang. Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Tilicho. Explore the local area and enjoy a simple dinner at a nearby eatery.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 9: Explore Mustang: Visit Muktinath Temple and nearby attractions. Lunch at a local restaurant, try chicken curry. Enjoy the scenic views and return to Hotel Tilicho for dinner.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 10: Ride to Bhedetar: Ride to Bhedetar. Check into a budget hotel like Hotel Namaste Jharana. Explore the hill station and enjoy a simple dinner at the hotel.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 11: Explore Bhedetar: Visit Charles Point and other local attractions. Lunch at a local restaurant, try momos and dalbhat. Relax and enjoy the views. Return to the hotel for dinner.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 12: Ride to Chitwan: Motorcycle ride to Chitwan. Check into a budget hotel like Chitwan Tiger Camp. Relax and enjoy a traditional Nepali dinner at the hotel.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 13: Chitwan National Park: Full day of jungle activities in Chitwan National Park including a jungle safari. Packed lunch provided. Dinner at the hotel, try chicken curry and roti.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 14: Explore Chitwan: Morning canoe trip on the Rapti River. Lunch at a local restaurant, try dalbhat. Visit Tharu Village in the afternoon. Return to the hotel for dinner.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 15: Ride back to Kathmandu: Motorcycle ride back to Kathmandu. Check into Hotel Yala Peak. Dinner at a local restaurant, try momos and dalbhat.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 16: Relax in Kathmandu: Relax and explore more of Kathmandu. Visit local markets and shops. Lunch at a local eatery, try chicken curry. Return to the hotel for dinner.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 17: Day Trip to Nagarkot: Day trip to Nagarkot on the motorcycle. Enjoy the panoramic views of the Himalayas. Packed lunch. Return to Kathmandu in the evening.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 18: Cultural Tour in Kathmandu: Visit Patan Durbar Square and Bhaktapur. Lunch at a local restaurant, try dalbhat and momos. Return to the hotel for dinner.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 19: Free Day in Kathmandu: Free day to explore or relax. Optional shopping or additional sightseeing. Lunch and dinner at local eateries.

a0ed99e2-30bc-41b9-8826-b843b5a84db0.Day 20: Departure: Final shopping and packing. Transfer to Tribhuvan International Airport for your departure flight back to Australia.
